statements: SELECT * FROM TransportationEmissions
SELECT partner_name, emission_type, emission_amount FROM TransportationEmissions
SELECT partner_id, partner_name, emission_date FROM TransportationEmissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT emission_type FROM TransportationEmissions
SELECT partner_name, emission_amount FROM TransportationEmissions WHERE partner_id = 1
SELECT * FROM TransportationEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'Car'
SELECT partner_name, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM TransportationEmissions GROUP BY partner_name HAVING total_emission > 1000
SELECT partner_name, emission_date FROM TransportationEmissions WHERE emission_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY emission_date DESC
SELECT partner_name, emission_type, emission_amount FROM TransportationEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 500 ORDER BY partner_name ASC, emission_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT partner_name FROM TransportationEmissions ORDER BY partner_name DESC
SELECT * FROM logistics_partners;
SELECT partner_id, partner_name FROM logistics_partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC;
SELECT partner_id, partner_name, emissions_kg FROM logistics_partners WHERE emissions_kg > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' AND emission_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_id, partner_id, timestamp, emission_type, emission_value FROM emissions_data WHERE partner_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT partner_name, emissions_kg FROM logistics_partners WHERE partner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY emission_value DESC;

SELECT partner_name, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM logistics_partners JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partners.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id GROUP BY partner_id HAVING total_emissions > 1000;

SELECT partner_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, timestamp, NOW()) AS days_since_emission FROM logistics_partners JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partners.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id WHERE emission_value > 500 ORDER BY days_since_emission ASC;

SELECT partner_name, COUNT(data_id) AS emission_count FROM logistics_partners JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partners.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id GROUP BY partner_id ORDER BY emission_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_partner;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM logistics_partner ORDER BY partner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_value > 1000;
SELECT partner_name, emission_date FROM logistics_partner INNER JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partner.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM logistics_partner;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM logistics_partner WHERE partner_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM emissions_data ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT partner_name, emission_value FROM logistics_partner INNER JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partner.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_report WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM logistics_partners;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM logistics_partners ORDER BY partner_location DESC;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location, emissions_data FROM logistics_partners WHERE partner_location = 'New York';
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM logistics_partners WHERE partner_id = 3;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location, emissions_data.CO2_emission FROM logistics_partners INNER JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partners.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id;
SELECT * FROM logistics_partners;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM logistics_partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC;

SELECT partner_name, partner_location, CO2_emission FROM logistics_partners INNER JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partners.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id WHERE CO2_emission > 100 ORDER BY CO2_emission ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT partner_location FROM logistics_partners WHERE partner_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT partner_name, emission_date, CO2_emission FROM emissions_data INNER JOIN logistics_partners ON emissions_data.partner_id = logistics_partners.partner_id ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_partners;
SELECT partner_name, emissions_data FROM logistics_partners WHERE partner_type='Supplier';
SELECT partner_name, partner_type, emissions_data FROM logistics_partners ORDER BY partner_type DESC;
SELECT mode_name, mode_description FROM transport_modes WHERE mode_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM logistics_partners;
SELECT partner_name, partner_type FROM logistics_partners WHERE emissions_data > 1000;
SELECT mode_name, mode_description FROM transport_modes ORDER BY mode_name DESC;

SELECT partner_name, mode_name, emission_amount FROM logistics_partners JOIN emissions_data ON logistics_partners.partner_id = emissions_data.partner_id WHERE emission_amount < 500 ORDER BY emission_amount ASC;
SELECT partner_name, factor_type, factor_value FROM logistics_partners, emission_factors WHERE logistics_partners.partner_id = emission_factors.factor_id;
